detail_desc: V-neck blouse in an airy weave with a pleated yoke front and back, long sleeves with an opening and ties at the cuffs, and a straight-cut hem.

KATE MORGAN x H&M. Sleeveless top in an airy, patterned viscose weave with a gathered neckline. Narrow shoulder straps with flounces that have a scalloped contrasting colour trim that meet at the back and finish in a decorative bow. Elastication at the top of the back.
Jacquard-knit socks in a soft cotton blend with elasticated tops.
Boxer shorts in cotton jersey with short legs, an elasticated waist and lined front.
Boxer shorts in cotton jersey with short legs, an elasticated waist and lined front.
Boxer shorts in cotton jersey with short legs, an elasticated waist and lined front.
Handbag in braided jute with bamboo handles and a narrow, braided shoulder strap. Size 12x24x35 cm.
3/4-length trousers in a crinkled cotton weave with an elasticated paper bag waist, decorative tie detail with glittery tassels, and straight, wide legs.
3/4-length trousers in a crinkled cotton weave with an elasticated paper bag waist, decorative tie detail with glittery tassels, and straight, wide legs.

Knitted jacket with a soft thermal fleece lining, stand-up collar and zip down the front with a chin guard. Small appliqué on one sleeve, side pockets and a contrasting colour jersey trim around the pockets, cuffs and hem. The jacket is made partly from recycled polyester.

Knitted jacket with a soft thermal fleece lining, stand-up collar and zip down the front with a chin guard. Small appliqué on one sleeve, side pockets and a contrasting colour jersey trim around the pockets, cuffs and hem. The jacket is made partly from recycled polyester.
Leather sandals with leather insoles and rubber soles.
Leather sandals with leather insoles and rubber soles.

High-waisted, ankle-length sports tights in fast-drying functional fabric. Wide panel to hold in and shape the waist containing a concealed key pocket. Sculpting seams at the back that showcase the body’s physique.

Jersey trousers with a regular, elasticated waist and straight, wide legs with sewn-in creases and contrasting colour side panels.
Long-sleeved body in ribbed jersey with a lace-trimmed V-neck, low-cut back, seam at the waist and concealed press-studs at the crotch.

Bra top in soft fabric designed with the minimum number of seams for a more comfortable fit and increased mobility. Removable inserts that shape the bust and provide good support. Narrow, adjustable shoulder straps and elasticated ribbing at the hem. No fasteners.

Bra top in soft fabric designed with the minimum number of seams for a more comfortable fit and increased mobility. Removable inserts that shape the bust and provide good support. Narrow, adjustable shoulder straps and elasticated ribbing at the hem. No fasteners.
One-shoulder body in lace. Double layer at the top with lightly padded cups and removable inserts, a lined gusset and a string back.
Thong briefs in lace with a low waist, lined gusset, decorative straps that cross at the back, and a string back.
Thong briefs in lace with a low waist, lined gusset, decorative straps that cross at the back, and a string back.
Thong briefs in lace with a low waist, lined gusset, decorative straps that cross at the back, and a string back.
Strapless bandeau bra in soft cotton jersey. Double layer at the top with jersey-lined cups and removable inserts, side support and a silicone trim at the top. No fasteners.
Strapless bandeau bra in soft cotton jersey. Double layer at the top with jersey-lined cups and removable inserts, side support and a silicone trim at the top. No fasteners.

Strapless balconette bralette in lace with underwired, thickly padded cups to maximise the bust and create a fuller cleavage. Detachable, adjustable shoulder straps, side support and a wide fastening at the back with several pairs of hooks and eyes.
Ankle-length, A-line beach dress in an airy, patterned weave with a deep V-neck with gold-coloured studs, and long dolman sleeves with elastication and a decorative drawstring at the cuffs. Unlined.

Short beach dress in an airy cotton weave with broderie anglaise. V-neck front and back with a crocheted lace trim, horizontal, tasselled straps at the back of the neck, dropped shoulders and short sleeves. Seam at the waist and a gently flared skirt. Unlined.

Short beach dress in an airy cotton weave with broderie anglaise. V-neck front and back with a crocheted lace trim, horizontal, tasselled straps at the back of the neck, dropped shoulders and short sleeves. Seam at the waist and a gently flared skirt. Unlined.
Warm-lined ankle boots with pointed toes and block heels. Soft faux fur linings and insoles. Platform 1.7 cm. Heel 9.5 cm.
Warm-lined ankle boots with pointed toes and block heels. Soft faux fur linings and insoles. Platform 1.7 cm. Heel 9.5 cm.
Ankle boots with covered block heels and a shaft with a visible zip in one side. Fabric linings and imitation leather insoles. Platform front approx. 1.5 cm, heel 9 cm.
Ankle boots with covered block heels and a shaft with a visible zip in one side. Fabric linings and imitation leather insoles. Platform front approx. 1.5 cm, heel 9 cm.
Ankle boots with covered block heels and a shaft with a visible zip in one side. Fabric linings and imitation leather insoles. Platform front approx. 1.5 cm, heel 9 cm.
V-neck top in jersey with a supersoft, brushed finish. Low dropped shoulders, long sleeves and a tie detail at the hem.
Leggings in soft jersey made from an organic cotton blend with an elasticated waist.
Fabric-covered Alice band with shimmering metallic imitation leather ears.
Warm-lined ankle boots with a zip at one side and loop at the back. Soft pile linings and insoles and patterned soles.
Warm-lined ankle boots with a zip at one side and loop at the back. Soft pile linings and insoles and patterned soles.

Gently fitted, double-breasted jacket in cotton corduroy with notch lapels and flap front pockets. Lined.
Straight-cut single-breasted jacket in a crêpe weave with notch lapels and long sleeves with slits at the cuffs. Unlined.
NATHALIE LÉTÉ x H&M. 5-pocket skirt in washed, stretch cotton denim with print motifs on the front. Adjustable, elasticated waist (in sizes 8-12Y), zip fly and button and a raw-edge, frayed hem.
Vest top in rib-knit cotton with buttons down the front.

Tunic in a cotton weave with broderie anglaise. Small frilled collar an opening with covered buttons at the back of the neck, long raglan sleeves, wide cuffs with a flounce and covered buttons, and a flounce at the hem. Inner tunic in a viscose weave with narrow, adjustable shoulder straps.

Tunic in a cotton weave with broderie anglaise. Small frilled collar an opening with covered buttons at the back of the neck, long raglan sleeves, wide cuffs with a flounce and covered buttons, and a flounce at the hem. Inner tunic in a viscose weave with narrow, adjustable shoulder straps.
Shorts in a sturdy cotton weave with a ribbed, elasticated drawstring waist. Pockets in the side seams, flap leg pockets with a hook and loop fastening and fake back pockets with a flap.

NATHALIE LÉTÉ x H&M. Cold shoulder dress in an airy, patterned cotton weave. Opening with a button at the back of the neck, short, elasticated sleeves with a small frill trim at the shoulders, a gathered seam at the waist and a gently flared skirt.
High-waisted jeans in washed, superstretch denim with a print motif. Zip fly and button, fake front pockets, real back pockets and skinny legs.

Rain jacket in wind- and waterproof functional fabric with closed seams. Stand-up collar, detachable hood, press-studs down the front and flap side pockets with a press-stud. Unlined. The jacket has a water-repellent coating without fluorocarbons.

Rain jacket in wind- and waterproof functional fabric with closed seams. Stand-up collar, detachable hood, press-studs down the front and flap side pockets with a press-stud. Unlined. The jacket has a water-repellent coating without fluorocarbons.

Softshell jacket in windproof, water-repellent functional fabric with folded seams and reflective details. Detachable, fleece-lined hood, a high collar, zip down the front, zipped side pockets and narrow elastication at the cuffs. Rounded and longer at the back. Brushed thermal inside. The jacket has a water-repellent coating without fluorocarbons.

Softshell jacket in windproof, water-repellent functional fabric with folded seams and reflective details. Detachable, fleece-lined hood, a high collar, zip down the front, zipped side pockets and narrow elastication at the cuffs. Rounded and longer at the back. Brushed thermal inside. The jacket has a water-repellent coating without fluorocarbons.
Hi-tops with a lightly padded edge and tongue, loop at the back, lacing at the front and a zip in one side. Pile linings and insoles.
